css:
<style>
.print-format {
    margin-left:05mm;
    margin-top:05mm;
    margin-right:05mm;
    margin-bottom:05mm;
}
.print-format td, .print-format th {
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 0.5px !important;
}
@media screen {
    .print-format {
    /*PRINTABLE WIDTH: 21.0cm */
    width: 10.16cm;
    /*PRINTABLE HEIGHT: 29.7cm*/
    min-height: 15.24cm;
    /*PADDING FROM MARGINS: 0.9cm, .354331in */
    padding: 0.5cm;
    }
    }
.float-container {
    border: 3px solid #fff;
    padding: 2px;
}

.float-child {
    width: 50%;
    float: left;
    padding: 2px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
.blue{
    text-align:right;
}
.float-child-2{
    width: 50%;
    float:left;
    padding:2px;
}
.float-container-2 {
    padding: 5px;
}
.head-section{
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
</style>
html:
Stock Transfer Report Document Date : {{doc.get_formatted("posting_date")}} {{doc.get_formatted("posting_time")}}

Doc #: {{doc.name}}


From Warehouse: {{doc.items[0].s_warehouse}}
To Warehouse: {{doc.items[0].t_warehouse}}

Sr BarcodeImage SkuSuffix ItemName ItemQty ItemLocation
{{ row.idx }} {% set barcodes = frappe.db.get_value('Item Barcode', {'parent': row.item_code}, ['barcode']) %} {% if barcodes %} {% elif row.barcode %} {% endif %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Item", row.item_code, "ifw_retailskusuffix") }} {{ row.item_name }} {{ row.qty }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Item", row.item_code, "ifw_location") }}
Total Quantity: {{vars.get('qty')}}
name: Stock Entry 4x6
